name: @yuanzhibang/oauth-server
description: 服务器端使用的oauth相关接口的封装

scripts.start-test-redis: docker stop test-redis-server ; docker rm test-redis-server  ; docker run  -p 6379:6379 -d --name test-redis-server redis
scripts.stop-test-redis: docker stop test-redis-server ; docker rm test-redis-server;
scripts.prepublish-npm: rm -rf dist ; npm run prod ; cp package.json dist/package.json ; cp LICENSE dist/LICENSE ; cp NOTICE dist/NOTICE ; cp README.md dist/README.md ;
scripts.publish-npm: cd dist ; npm publish --access public --registry https://registry.npmjs.com
